content:
TITLE: Implementing Accessibility-Friendly Checkbox in HTML DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the ideal HTML structure for an accessible checkbox, which directly associates the input with its label. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/web_src/js/modules/fomantic/aria.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Integration Tests with Make Commands DESCRIPTION: Basic make commands for running integration tests with different database backends (SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL). SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make test-sqlite make test-pgsql make test-mysql make test-mssql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running E2E Tests with Different Database Backends DESCRIPTION: Commands to run end-to-end tests with different database backends (SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL). SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make test-sqlite make test-pgsql make test-mysql make test-mssql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Gitea 1.20.0 Release Notes in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatted changelog listing all changes, including breaking changes, security fixes, new features, API changes and enhancements for Gitea version 1.20.0 released on 2023-07-16 SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.20.0](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/releases/tag/v1.20.0) - 2023-07-16 * BREAKING * Fix WORK_DIR for docker (root) image (#25738) (#25811) * Restrict `[actions].DEFAULT_ACTIONS_URL` to only `github` or `self` (#25581) (#25604) * Refactor path & config system (#25330) (#25416) * Fix all possible setting error related storages and added some tests (#23911) (#25244) ... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Gitea from Source with Default Tags DESCRIPTION: Command to build Gitea from source with the 'bindata' tag, which embeds static assets into the binary for easier deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Bash CODE: ``` TAGS="bindata" make build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Gitea Web Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Gitea web server after building the binary, which will launch the application with the default configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: Bash CODE: ``` ./gitea web ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Gitea with SQLite Support DESCRIPTION: Command to build Gitea with SQLite database support, which requires additional tags for SQLite functionality and notification features. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: Bash CODE: ``` TAGS="bindata sqlite sqlite_unlock_notify" make build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Standard Copyright Header in Gitea DESCRIPTION: Standard copyright header that should be included at the beginning of all new code files contributed to the Gitea project. The header includes the current year, indicates Gitea Authors as the copyright holders, and specifies the MIT license. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Go CODE: ``` // Copyright The Gitea Authors. All rights reserved. // SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Package Model Relationship Diagram in Markdown DESCRIPTION: A simple text diagram showing the relationship between the package registry models. It illustrates how Package, PackageVersion, PackageFile, and PackageBlob models are related through one-to-many relationships. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/routers/api/packages/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Package <1---*> PackageVersion <1---*> PackageFile <*---1> PackageBlob ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running PostgreSQL Integration Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run integration tests against a PostgreSQL database with MinIO storage and specific connection parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_MINIO_ENDPOINT=localhost:9000 TEST_PGSQL_HOST=localhost:5432 TEST_PGSQL_DBNAME=postgres TEST_PGSQL_USERNAME=postgres TEST_PGSQL_PASSWORD=postgres make test-pgsql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Preparing Frontend for E2E Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to clean and rebuild the frontend before running tests. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make clean frontend ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Release Notes for Gitea v1.14.2 DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive changelog for Gitea version 1.14.2 including API changes, bug fixes, enhancements and misc changes. Documents improvements to repository settings, notifications, UI fixes and performance optimizations. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG-archived.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.14.2](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/releases/tag/v1.14.2) - 2021-05-09 * API * Make change repo settings work on empty repos (#15778) (#15789) * Add pull "merged" notification subject status to API (#15344) (#15654) * BUGFIXES * Ensure that ctx.Written is checked after issues(...) calls (#15797) (#15798) * Use pulls in commit graph unless pulls are disabled (#15734 & #15740 & #15774) (#15775) * Set GIT_DIR correctly if it is not set (#15751) (#15769) * Fix bug where repositories appear unadopted (#15757) (#15767) * Not show `ref-in-new-issue` pop when issue was disabled (#15761) (#15765) * Drop back to use IsAnInteractiveSession for SVC (#15749) (#15762) * Fix setting version table in dump (#15753) (#15759) * Fix close button change on delete in simplemde area (#15737) (#15747) * Defer closing the gitrepo until the end of the wrapped context functions (#15653) (#15746) * Fix some ui bug about draft release (#15137) (#15745) * Only log Error on getLastCommitStatus error to let pull list still be visible (#15716) (#15715) * Move tooltip down to allow selection of Remove File on error (#15672) (#15714) * Fix setting redis db path (#15698) (#15708) * Fix DB session cleanup (#15697) (#15700) * Fixed several activation bugs (#15473) (#15685) * Delete references if repository gets deleted (#15681) (#15684) * Fix orphaned objects deletion bug (#15657) (#15683) * Delete protected branch if repository gets removed (#15658) (#15676) * Remove spurious set name from eventsource.sharedworker.js (#15643) (#15652) * Not update updated uinx for `git gc` (#15637) (#15641) * Fix commit graph author link (#15627) (#15630) * Fix webhook timeout bug (#15613) (#15621) * Resolve panic on failed interface conversion in migration v156 (#15604) (#15610) * Fix missing storage init (#15589) (#15598) * If the default branch is not present do not report error on stats indexing (#15546 & #15583) (#15594) * Fix lfs management find (#15537) (#15578) * Fix NPE on view commit with notes (#15561) (#15573) * Fix bug on commit graph (#15517) (#15530) * Send size to /avatars if requested (#15459) (#15528) * Prevent migration 156 failure if tag commit missing (#15519) (#15527) * ENHANCEMENTS * Display conflict-free merge messages for pull requests (#15773) (#15796) * Exponential Backoff for ByteFIFO (#15724) (#15793) * Issue list alignment tweaks (#15483) (#15766) * Implement delete release attachments and update release attachments' name (#14130) (#15666) * Add placeholder text to deploy key textarea (#15575) (#15576) * Project board improvements (#15429) (#15560) * Repo branch page: label size, PR ref, new PR button alignment (#15363) (#15365) * MISC * Fix webkit calendar icon color on arc-green (#15713) (#15728) * Performance improvement for last commit cache and show-ref (#15455) (#15701) * Bump unrolled/render to v1.1.0 (#15581) (#15608) * Add ETag header (#15370) (#15552) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up PostgreSQL Database in Docker for Testing DESCRIPTION: Docker command to set up a PostgreSQL database for integration testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` docker run -e "POSTGRES_DB=test" -e "POSTGRES_USER=postgres" -e "POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres" -p 5432:5432 --rm --name pgsql postgres:latest #(just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting Gitea Release Notes DESCRIPTION: A markdown formatted changelog documenting changes in Gitea v1.17.0 including breaking changes, security updates, federation features, new features, API changes and enhancements. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.17.0](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/releases/tag/v1.17.0) - 2022-07-30 * BREAKING * Require go1.18 for Gitea 1.17 (#19918) * Make AppDataPath absolute against the AppWorkPath if it is not (#19815) * Nuke the incorrect permission report on /api/v1/notifications (#19761) [...] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up PostgreSQL Database for E2E Testing DESCRIPTION: Command to start a PostgreSQL container for testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` docker run -e "POSTGRES_DB=test" -p 5432:5432 --rm --name pgsql postgres:latest #(just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Read-Only Dropdown in HTML DESCRIPTION: Illustrates the HTML structure for a read-only dropdown menu using Fomantic UI classes, which requires JavaScript for full functionality and accessibility improvements. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/web_src/js/modules/fomantic/aria.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
Default
Default
...
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running SQLite E2E Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to start E2E tests with SQLite database. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make test-e2e-sqlite ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up MinIO in Docker for Testing DESCRIPTION: Docker command to set up a MinIO server for object storage testing with PostgreSQL. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` docker run --rm -p 9000:9000 -e MINIO_ROOT_USER=123456 -e MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=12345678 --name minio bitnami/minio:2023.8.31 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running MySQL E2E Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run E2E tests with MySQL database configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_MYSQL_HOST=localhost:3306 TEST_MYSQL_DBNAME=test TEST_MYSQL_USERNAME=root TEST_MYSQL_PASSWORD='' make test-e2e-mysql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Release Notes DESCRIPTION: Structured changelog documenting the various changes, improvements, and fixes in Gitea v1.18.0. The changelog is organized into sections including security updates, breaking changes, new features, API changes, enhancements, and bug fixes. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.18.0](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/releases/tag/v1.18.0) - 2022-12-29 * SECURITY * Remove ReverseProxy authentication from the API (#22219) (#22251) * Support Go Vulnerability Management (#21139) * Forbid HTML string tooltips (#20935) * BREAKING * Rework mailer settings (#18982) * Remove U2F support (#20141) * Refactor `i18n` to `locale` (#20153) * Enable contenthash in filename for dynamic assets (#20813) [...remaining content truncated for brevity...] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up MSSQL Database in Docker for Testing DESCRIPTION: Docker command to set up a Microsoft SQL Server database for integration testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` docker run -e "ACCEPT_EULA=Y" -e "MSSQL_PID=Standard" -e "SA_PASSWORD=MwantsaSecurePassword1" -p 1433:1433 --rm --name mssql microsoft/mssql-server-linux:latest #(just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up MySQL Database for E2E Testing DESCRIPTION: Commands to start MySQL and Elasticsearch containers for testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` docker run -e "MYSQL_DATABASE=test" -e "MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=yes" -p 3306:3306 --rm --name mysql mysql:latest #(just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) docker run -p 9200:9200 -p 9300:9300 -e "discovery.type=single-node" --rm --name elasticsearch elasticsearch:7.6.0 #(in a second terminal, just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up MySQL Database in Docker for Testing DESCRIPTION: Docker commands to set up a MySQL database and Elasticsearch for integration testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` docker run -e "MYSQL_DATABASE=test" -e "MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=yes" -p 3306:3306 --rm --name mysql mysql:latest #(just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) docker run -p 9200:9200 -p 9300:9300 -e "discovery.type=single-node" --rm --name elasticsearch elasticsearch:7.6.0 #(in a second terminal, just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up MSSQL Database for E2E Testing DESCRIPTION: Command to start a Microsoft SQL Server container for testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` docker run -e "ACCEPT_EULA=Y" -e "MSSQL_PID=Standard" -e "SA_PASSWORD=MwantsaSecurePassword1" -p 1433:1433 --rm --name mssql microsoft/mssql-server-linux:latest #(just ctrl-c to stop db and clean the container) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running MSSQL E2E Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run E2E tests with Microsoft SQL Server database configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_MSSQL_HOST=localhost:1433 TEST_MSSQL_DBNAME=gitea_test TEST_MSSQL_USERNAME=sa TEST_MSSQL_PASSWORD=MwantsaSecurePassword1 make test-e2e-mssql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Release Notes for Gitea v1.14.1 DESCRIPTION: Detailed changelog for Gitea version 1.14.1 including bug fixes, enhancements and build changes. Documents fixes for wiki functionality, GitHub migration, and various UI improvements. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG-archived.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.14.1](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/releases/tag/v1.14.1) - 2021-04-15 * BUGFIXES * Fix bug clone wiki (#15499) (#15502) * Github Migration ignore rate limit, if not enabled (#15490) (#15495) * Use subdir for URL (#15446) (#15493) * Query the DB for the hash before inserting in to email_hash (#15457) (#15491) * Ensure review dismissal only dismisses the correct review (#15477) (#15489) * Use index of the supported tags to choose user lang (#15452) (#15488) * Fix wrong file link in code search page (#15466) (#15486) * Quick template fix for built-in SSH server in admin config (#15464) (#15481) * Prevent superfluous response.WriteHeader (#15456) (#15476) * Fix ambiguous argument error on tags (#15432) (#15474) * Add created_unix instead of expiry to migration (#15458) (#15463) * Fix repository search (#15428) (#15442) * Prevent NPE on avatar direct rendering if federated avatars disabled (#15434) (#15439) * Fix wiki clone urls (#15430) (#15431) * Fix dingtalk icon url at webhook (#15417) (#15426) * Standardise icon on projects PR page (#15387) (#15408) * ENHANCEMENTS * Add option to skip LFS/attachment files for `dump` (#15407) (#15492) * Clone panel fixes (#15436) * Use semantic dropdown for code search query type (#15276) (#15364) * BUILD * Build go-git variants for windows (#15482) (#15487) * Lock down build-images dependencies (Partial #15479) (#15480) * MISC * Performance improvement for list pull requests (#15447) (#15500) * Fix potential copy lfs records failure when fork a repository (#15441) (#15485) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Issue Closure Format in PR Summary DESCRIPTION: Required format for noting which issues are closed by a pull request. Each issue must be on a separate line using GitHub/Gitea compatible syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Fixes/Closes/Resolves #. Fixes/Closes/Resolves #. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Performing Clean Build Before Testing DESCRIPTION: Command to perform a clean build before running tests to ensure a fresh environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make clean build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Single Integration Test Job with act_runner DESCRIPTION: Command to run a specific integration test job using act_runner with GitHub workflow files. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` act_runner exec -W ./.github/workflows/pull-db-tests.yml --event=pull_request --default-actions-url="https://github.com" -i catthehacker/ubuntu:runner-latest -j ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running All Integration Test Jobs with act_runner DESCRIPTION: Command to run all integration test jobs using act_runner with GitHub workflow files. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` act_runner exec -W ./.github/workflows/pull-db-tests.yml --event=pull_request --default-actions-url="https://github.com" -i catthehacker/ubuntu:runner-latest ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Custom Timeouts for Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to set custom timeouts for slow test runs and slow clean-up flushes when running integration tests. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` GITEA_TEST_SLOW_RUN="10s" GITEA_TEST_SLOW_FLUSH="1s" make test-sqlite ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Formatted Release Notes DESCRIPTION: Detailed changelog entries documenting breaking changes, new features, bug fixes, enhancements and miscellaneous updates across three Gitea releases. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG-archived.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [1.1.0](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/releases/tag/v1.1.0) - 2017-03-09 * BREAKING * The SSH keys can potentially break, make sure to regenerate the authorized keys * FEATURES * Git LFSv2 support [#122](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/122) * API endpoints for repo watching [#191](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/191) [...additional content truncated for brevity...] ## [1.0.1](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/releases/tag/v1.0.1) - 2017-01-05 * BUGFIXES * Fixed localized `MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH` [#501](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/501) * Fixed 500 error on organization delete [#507](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/507) [...additional content truncated for brevity...] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Playwright System Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Command to install the system dependencies required by Playwright for E2E testing. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` npx playwright install-deps ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Tests via Local GitHub Actions Runner DESCRIPTION: Command to execute tests using a local GitHub Actions runner with the pull-e2e-tests workflow. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` act_runner exec -W ./.github/workflows/pull-e2e-tests.yml --event=pull_request --default-actions-url="https://github.com" -i catthehacker/ubuntu:runner-latest ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Individual GPG Test with SQLite DESCRIPTION: Command to run only the GPG test with SQLite database backend. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make test-sqlite#GPG ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Gitea Security GPG Key Details DESCRIPTION: GPG key identifier information for encrypting security communications with Gitea team. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/SECURITY.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Key ID: 6FCD2D5B Key Type: RSA Expires: 7/9/2025 Key Size: 4096/4096 Fingerprint: 3DE0 3D1E 144A 7F06 9359 99DC AAFD 2381 6FCD 2D5B ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Main Branch PR Commit Message Format DESCRIPTION: Required format for commit messages when merging pull requests targeting the main branch. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $PR_TITLE ($PR_INDEX) $REWRITTEN_PR_SUMMARY ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running MySQL Integration Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run integration tests against a MySQL database with specific connection parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_MYSQL_HOST=localhost:3306 TEST_MYSQL_DBNAME=test TEST_MYSQL_USERNAME=root TEST_MYSQL_PASSWORD='' make test-mysql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Breaking Change Section Format DESCRIPTION: Required markdown format for indicating breaking changes in a pull request summary. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## :warning: BREAKING :warning: ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Required Tools for Gitea Mixin DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the necessary tools (jsonnet-bundler and go-jsonnet) for generating Gitea Mixin dashboard configurations. Also mentions an alternative installation method using Homebrew. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/contrib/gitea-monitoring-mixin/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` go install github.com/jsonnet-bundler/jsonnet-bundler/cmd/jb@latest go install github.com/google/go-jsonnet/cmd/jsonnet@latest # or in brew: brew install go-jsonnet ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Gitea Mixin Dashboard Files DESCRIPTION: Command to build the JSON dashboard files after configuring the settings in config.libsonnet. This generates the files needed to be imported into Grafana. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/contrib/gitea-monitoring-mixin/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` make ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Backport PR Titles in Gitea DESCRIPTION: The standard format for backport PR titles in the Gitea project, referencing the original PR title and number for traceability. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` (#) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running MSSQL Integration Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run integration tests against a Microsoft SQL Server database with specific connection parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_MSSQL_HOST=localhost:1433 TEST_MSSQL_DBNAME=gitea_test TEST_MSSQL_USERNAME=sa TEST_MSSQL_PASSWORD=MwantsaSecurePassword1 make test-mssql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Backport PR Commit Message Format DESCRIPTION: Required format for commit messages when merging backport pull requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $PR_TITLE ($INITIAL_PR_INDEX) ($BACKPORT_PR_INDEX) $REWRITTEN_PR_SUMMARY ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Linting and Formatting Tools for Gitea Mixin DESCRIPTION: Commands to install mixtool and jsonnetfmt, which are used for linting and formatting Gitea Mixin dashboard configurations. These tools require a working Go development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/contrib/gitea-monitoring-mixin/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` go install github.com/monitoring-mixins/mixtool/cmd/mixtool@latest go install github.com/google/go-jsonnet/cmd/jsonnetfmt@latest ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Integration Testing Framework Updates DESCRIPTION: Integration test configurations and improvements including database handling, test coverage, and automated testing procedures SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG-archived.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Gitea Sidebar Combo Component Structure in HTML DESCRIPTION: HTML structure for a combo component that combines a dropdown menu with a list display. The component supports single/multiple selection modes, clear functionality, and backend synchronization via data-update-url. Items can be grouped by data-scope attribute where only one item per scope can be selected. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/web_src/js/features/repo-issue-sidebar.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
clear
... ...
no item ...
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running PostgreSQL E2E Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run E2E tests with PostgreSQL database configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_PGSQL_HOST=localhost:5432 TEST_PGSQL_DBNAME=test TEST_PGSQL_USERNAME=postgres TEST_PGSQL_PASSWORD=postgres make test-e2e-pgsql ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Git Commit Message Format DESCRIPTION: Shows the format used for git commit messages in the Gitea project. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: git CODE: ``` --message=%s ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using DCO Sign-off Format in Git Commits DESCRIPTION: The standard format for adding a Developer Certificate of Origin (DCO) sign-off line to commit messages, which can be automated with git commit -s. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Signed-off-by: Joe Smith ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Backport PR Summary Content in Gitea DESCRIPTION: The required format for the beginning of a backport PR summary, which must reference the original PR number followed by a blank line. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Backport # ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Search Input Dropdown in HTML DESCRIPTION: Shows the HTML structure for a searchable dropdown menu using Fomantic UI classes, requiring JavaScript for full functionality and accessibility enhancements. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/web_src/js/modules/fomantic/aria.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
...
...
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running SQLite Integration Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run integration tests using SQLite database. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make test-sqlite ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Build System Makefile Configurations DESCRIPTION: Make commands and build system configurations for managing the build process, including translation updates and test execution SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG-archived.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4 ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PyPi Package Index URL Configuration DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the usage of the index-url parameter for PyPi package configurations. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` --index-url ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Navigation Element Usage DESCRIPTION: Shows the replacement of div elements with semantic nav elements in the global navigation bar. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Build Configuration - Dockerfile for ARM Architecture DESCRIPTION: Dockerfile configuration for building Gitea on aarch64 architecture (#1128, #1130) SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/CHANGELOG-archived.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Individual SQLite E2E Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run a specific E2E test file with SQLite database. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make test-e2e-sqlite#example ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Gitea Security GPG Public Key Block DESCRIPTION: Complete PGP public key block for encrypting security-related communications with the Gitea security team, valid until July 9, 2025. Individual GPG Test with Other Databases DESCRIPTION: Command to run only the GPG test with MSSQL database backend (can be replaced with MySQL or PostgreSQL). SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_MSSQL_HOST=localhost:1433 TEST_MSSQL_DBNAME=test TEST_MSSQL_USERNAME=sa TEST_MSSQL_PASSWORD=MwantsaSecurePassword1 make test-mssql#GPG ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Individual Database-specific E2E Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run a specific E2E test file with a specified database (MSSQL example shown). SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/e2e/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` TEST_MSSQL_HOST=localhost:1433 TEST_MSSQL_DBNAME=test TEST_MSSQL_USERNAME=sa TEST_MSSQL_PASSWORD=MwantsaSecurePassword1 make test-e2e-mssql#example ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Integration Test Jobs with act_runner DESCRIPTION: Command to list all available integration test jobs in the workflow file using act_runner. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/tests/integration/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` act_runner exec -W ./.github/workflows/pull-db-tests.yml --event=pull_request --default-actions-url="https://github.com" -i catthehacker/ubuntu:runner-latest -l ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Fomantic-style Checkbox in HTML DESCRIPTION: Shows the current Fomantic UI checkbox structure used in templates, which requires JavaScript intervention to improve accessibility. SOURCE: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/blob/main/web_src/js/modules/fomantic/aria.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
